title: Best of The Herd: 05/28/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 05/28/2019
description:
Colin says the "Basketball Gods" are pushing Kevin Durant to New York and making the split with the Warriors easier for both sides. He thinks the Lakers dysfunction will force them to trade for a star because nobody will choose to sign there. FS1 NBA Insider Ric Bucher tells Colin that both Kyrie Irving and Kevin Durant have purchased homes in the New York area. Plus, Raptors Head Coach Nick Nurse talks with Colin about his long journey to the NBA and why Drake might have the world's softest hands.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
